title: Establishment of the BarnBridge Benevolent Bond
body:
**Summary**
Create a BarnBridge Benevolent Fund which provides, on a quarterly basis, donations consisting of 1% of the previous quarter’s fees derived from the various products BarnBridge has to offer to non-profit organizations nominated, vetted, and voted on by the community.

**Motivation**
Increase awareness of the BarnBridge DAO through positive interaction with on-chain, recognized non-profit organizations. The BarnBridge community demonstrates how a decentralized organization can work together to provide a valuable service to all. Non-profit organizations, by their very nature, operate in a similar manner. While being led by a core team, they rely on the support of many to provide aid to others. By creating a link between the BarnBridge DAO and giving, we show our community is truly about working together to provide exceptional services for all. 

**Technical Details**
-	BarnBridge Benevolent Fund Team Structure
--	A team consisting of community members.
--	Team would work on a volunteer basis therefore not receiving compensation for work done as a member of the Fund Team. 
--	a multi-sig wallet would be used to disperse funds as directed by community vote.
-	Frequency
--	Quarterly.
-	Limitations on Chosen Philanthropies
--	A chosen philanthropy cannot receive donations from the fund more than once within a 6-month period.
-	Community Awareness
--	Creation of a BarnBridge DAF through endaoment.org
--	Promote Fund and grants across BarnBridge social media accounts.
--	Create a Discord room for discussion about various non-profits the community may want to support.
--	Future BarnBridge community gatherings and in-person volunteering.
--	Highlight a specific philanthropy the community wants to support.
--	Interview the receiving philanthropy, if applicable.
--	Medium post.
--	Provide quarterly reporting.

**Argumentation**

For
-	Generates great publicity and awareness of the BarnBridge DAO.
-	Creates potential increase in treasury through increased use of SY, SA, and SE products.
-	Binds BarnBridge community members closer together and sets the stage for potential real-world collaboration.

Against
-	Takes 1% of revenues away from reinvestment opportunities.
-	Community might be split on which causes to support.
-	BarnBridge is a diverse community with a global reach, which may cause consensus issues. It is important that we provide a variety of options to members when voting on donations. These include OSS, climate change, humanity crises, global education initiatives and smaller organizations that our community is directly involved in – among others. 
-	Unclear what the current universe of on-chain charitable organizations is.

**BarnBridge Forum Discussion**: https://forum.barnbridge.com/t/benevelontbond-philanthropy-fund/339/8

**Discord Embassy AMA**: https://discord.com/channels/748538797662273636/855117293771948082/860152692206600242
author: 0x78aD67Cb7d4cc05E9439eBd2a8132f8D3d1Ad63f
